title: Python for Absolute Beginners
author: Green Chameleon Learning
overview: In this course, you will be taught the fundamentals of Python through video lectures, quizzes, review exercises, and programming challenges.

title: React Front To Back
author: Brad Traversy
overview: This course is for anyone that wants to learn React and also for React developers looking to build some projects and sharpen their skills.

title: The Web Developer Bootcamp 2023
author: Ulvi S.
overview: Massive new React expansion pack covers: React basics, JSX, props, state, Vite, MaterialUI, hooks, useEffect, React design patterns, and more.
